context: When I install it on my bootcamp for windowns 7 It starts to install then nothing happens. I know my computer can run this game. Help Needed!!!

context: Is this entire game just one level?!!!!!

context: is this for the 1000 or 2000 series vita? i just tried to buy same brand from game stop and did not fit my original vita.
